event_description: In the peculiar nation of [Nation Name], a scandal has surfaced regarding government transparency, or lack thereof. It has come to light that the official government bathrooms are adorned with one-way mirrors, providing a voyeuristic view of the proceedings inside to certain high-ranking officials. The discovery has ignited a maelstrom of controversy, with citizens questioning the government's commitment to openness and accountability. Protests have erupted outside government buildings, demanding an end to this clandestine surveillance disguised as transparency.

event_options.option_description: We must dismantle these one-way mirrors immediately and apologize to the public for this invasive practice. Government transparency should start with literal transparency in our facilities!
event_options.option_outcome: The government issues a public apology, removes all one-way mirrors from government bathrooms, and launches a transparency initiative that increases public trust in the administration.

event_options.option_description: Let's spin this scandal positively. Install live streaming cameras in all government bathrooms to show that we have nothing to hide. We dub this project 'See Through Governance'!
event_options.option_outcome: The 'See Through Governance' project garners mixed reactions but ultimately improves government accountability as citizens can now tune in to watch their officials at work, quite literally.

event_options.option_description: Rather than removing the mirrors, let's embrace this 'unique' feature and turn it into a tourist attraction. Charge visitors for a peek into the mysterious world of government toilet views.
event_options.option_outcome: Tourism booms as curious visitors flock to witness the 'Transparent Toilet' experience, bringing in a bizarre yet lucrative revenue stream for the nation.

event_options.option_description: This scandal is a distraction from the real issues. Let's use it as an opportunity to focus on concrete policy reforms that enhance government transparency beyond mere optics.
event_options.option_outcome: The nation implements comprehensive transparency laws and practices, ensuring that government accountability goes beyond bathroom visibility and addresses core governance areas.
